text: Klein-Brabant is a Flemish region in the Belgian province of Antwerp. The region got a lot of attention during and after the broadcasting of the EÃ©n series Stille Waters. Also the yearly Dodentocht and the Schelde Internationale Muziekstroom-route contribute to the image of the region. The region includes the municipalities of Sint-Amands, Bornem and Puurs. There is also a police zone which is named Politiezone Klein-Brabant. Category:Antwerp (province)
title: Klein-Brabant
